SobreMiTexto: Hello, my name is José Mª Cámara and I am a student in the 2nd year of Higher Degree Professional Training in Computer Application Development. I am passionate about the world of technology, computing and music!
MisProyectosTexto: Click on the image to visit my GitHub and see all the code of this project and some more... I'm very excited about it!!! See you in the next projects!!!
AngularTexto: This project has been developed under Angular FrameWork, Firebase and Bootstrap. Visit their official sites to see all the documentation.
